properties.name: application.ids
properties.description: A comma-separated list of alexa application ids to listen for.

properties.name: application.db.persistence-mode
properties.description: Persistence Mode of Application. 'persistent' (default) or 'temporary'. If temporary, the Database contents get erased on shutdown.

properties.name: application.db.path
properties.description: Path for JsonDB files. Must be a directory.
